title: Episode 10 - Bill Burr
itunes:title: Episode 10 - Bill Burr
description:
Time for a cigar and a scotch as we break bread with the great Bill Burr. He’s one our greatest comedians and has a hilarious animated show ‘F is for Family’ on Netflix. 


Got to WineAccess.com/papa to get $20 off your first order of $50 or more!
